query: SELECT l.*, a."code" as "article__code", a."libelle" as "article__libelle", a."prix" as "article__prix", f."code" as "facture__code", f."clientCode" as "facture__clientCode", f."dateCommande" as "facture__dateCommande", f."nombreDePoints" as "facture__nombreDePoints", c."code" as "facture__client__code", c."civilite" as "facture__client__civilite", c."nom" as "facture__client__nom", c."prenom" as "facture__client__prenom"
JOIN article a ON l."articleCode" = a."code"
JOIN facture f ON l."factureCode" = f."code"
JOIN client c ON f."clientCode" = c."code"
WHERE c."code" = '${clientCode}' and f."code" = '${factureCode}' and l."code" = '${ligneCode}'
